title: ZHERAN LIU
text: I am a postdoctoral researcher with training in clinical medicine and oncology (MSc/PhD at West China Hospital) and a bachelor’s degree in Clinical Medicine (Nanchang University). My research interests lie at the intersection of cancer biology, bioinformatics, and clinical translation, with a focus on leveraging multi‑omics and computational methods to derive clinically actionable insights.
